  • public interface DeckInterface
    Deck Interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card get(int i)
      get method accepts a param int and uses it as an index to return a card in the deck
      Card getTop()
      getTop returns the top most card in the deck
      boolean isEmpty()
      isEmpty method sees if there is any cards left in the deck
      void Shuffle()
      Shuffle shuffles the deck via the Shuffle method from java.Collections
